name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Elixir Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering scalable and high-performance applications. Proficient in **Elixir**, with a strong emphasis on **functional programming**, **microservices**, and **event-driven architectures**. Adept at implementing **domain-driven design** (DDD) and adhering to **Agile** methodologies for efficient project management. Extensive experience in **troubleshooting** and **debugging**, complemented by expertise in **code reviews**, ensuring maintainable **code modularity**.
Skilled in backend development with a solid foundation in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience with frameworks and libraries including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Familiar with **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** for messaging services. Proven success in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, while proficiently deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Committed to **continuous learning** and alignment with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust **backend** solutions utilizing **Elixir** and functional programming principles, ensuring high scalability and maintainability through effective **code modularity** and adherence to **TDD** practices.
• Designed and implemented **microservices** architectures, employing **event-driven architecture** patterns with **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** to facilitate efficient communication between services.
• Led Agile development processes, fostering a culture of **collaboration** and continuous learning within cross-functional teams, while ensuring adherence to best practices during **code reviews**.
• Delivered comprehensive solutions involving troubleshooting and debugging of complex system interactions, enhancing overall reliability and performance of applications in production.
• Facilitated communication with stakeholders to gather requirements, manage expectations, and provide updates throughout project lifecycles, enhancing transparency and trust.
• Contributed to the establishment of testing frameworks to maintain high code quality through rigorous testing strategies, promoting confidence in new features and updates.
• Implemented best-practice methodologies in systems design to optimize performance, ensuring systems could manage increased loads and adapt to changing requirements efficiently.
• Worked on integrating external services, enhancing application functionality, and improving user experience through intuitive design and responsive interfaces.
• Engaged in peer programming and mentorship opportunities to nurture the skills of junior developers and enhance team performance through shared knowledge and best practices.

• Led the transformation of core financial platforms towards a **microservices** architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, increasing system scalability and accommodating **9 million** transactions per day.
• Utilized **Agile** methodologies to enhance team collaboration and foster continuous learning environments, regularly engaging in **code reviews** to maintain high code quality across all releases.
• Engineered asynchronous messaging with **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**, establishing a resilient **event-driven architecture** that improved workflow efficiency for critical processes like payments and alerts, reducing downtime by **25%**.
• Championed **domain-driven design** principles in application development which led to better **code modularity** and maintainability across multiple microservices, contributing to a **30%** reduction in deployment times.
• Developed robust troubleshooting and debugging strategies, which improved system reliability and reduced issue resolution time by **40%** through the integration of effective monitoring tools.
• Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, resulting in a seamless user experience for financial tools and admin panels, while maintaining **scalability** for increasing users.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, empowering operations teams with immediate insights into financial transactions, thus cutting down anomaly detection time to less than **2 hours**.
• Designed and set up efficient ETL pipelines for data ingestion leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, ensuring seamless integration of **financial data** from **3** internal and external sources.
• Deployed and maintained machine learning models for proactive fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, which reduced fraudulent transaction rates by **15%** through real-time analysis of transaction patterns.

• Engineered robust backend services utilizing **Elixir**, with a focus on **microservices** architecture and **functional programming**, ensuring high scalability and maintainability.
• Developed and deployed **event-driven architecture** with tools like **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**, enhancing the efficiency of real-time feature implementations and system responsiveness.
• Advocated **Agile** methodologies, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to drive code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices in **TDD** (Test-Driven Development).
• Optimized system performance and reliability through strategic **troubleshooting**, **debugging**, and proactive developments aimed at preventing future issues.
• Enhanced application modularity, applying principles of **domain-driven design** to streamline functions across diverse system components, impacting scalability positively.
• Participated in continuous learning initiatives, keeping abreast of industry trends and technologies to improve project outputs and foster a culture of innovation within the team.
• Collaborated with teams on communication protocols and tools, ensuring seamless project updates, and maintaining clarity throughout the development lifecycle.
• Helped in refining backend processes that resulted in a **30%** reduction in deployment time, directly contributing to the overall efficiency of the development cycle.
• Engaged in regular knowledge-sharing sessions, improving team skills in **scalability** and system architecture, which contributed to a **40%** increase in project delivery speed.
